TopicTitle: Thermal Control System Large wont highlight

Articles.Content:
Having issues with bugtracker for KSP1?  I log in with chrome, and I cant find a button to start a bug report.

Also, the regular forums wont load with chrome for me at the moment..

The bug I wanted to report is the Thermal Control System Large -  is currently hooked to this mining unit on Minmus.. and I cannot hover mouse / highlight the part green..  other parts work and highlight green...  but I can use the right-click to open its menu and see it is cooling..
This looks like an issue for modded support. And so, moved.

you are using restock and beause ts visual it dosent affect game play so i dont know how bad f an issue it is

i metioned restock because you shoudnt report a possible restock related but on the stock game bug tracker
